property.name: all.data.category.marking.upstream.error
property.description: If any data comes into the system already tagged with this security marking, then consider it an upstream error which is considered fatal in this system

property.name: all.filter.classes
property.description: This is the chain of context writers that will receive the output of all handlers and higher prioriy content writers

property.name: all.filter.priority
property.description: This is the priority of this context writer chain

property.name: all.ingest.policy.enforcer.class
property.description: Name of the class to use for policy enforcement

property.name: ingest.data.types
property.description: The list of datatypes to be processed by the system.
